[console_scripts]
nuitka = nuitka.__main__:main
nuitka-run = nuitka.__main__:main

[distutils.commands]
bdist_nuitka = nuitka.distutils.bdist_nuitka:bdist_nuitka
build_nuitka = nuitka.distutils.bdist_nuitka:build
install_nuitka = nuitka.distutils.bdist_nuitka:install

[distutils.setup_keywords]
build_with_nuitka = nuitka.distutils.bdist_nuitka:setuptools_build_hook
